  • Constructor Details

    • ActivateJesterEffectOperation

      public ActivateJesterEffectOperation(Game game, PlayerController playerController, ArrayList<PawnColor> requiredStudents, ArrayList<PawnColor> givenStudents)
      Parameters:
      game - the game state in which the player is in
      playerController - the player who's executing the operation
      requiredStudents - the students on the card that the player wants to put on the entrance
      givenStudents - the students on the entrance that the player wants to put on the card

  • Method Details

    • executeOperation

      public void executeOperation() throws PlayerNotInListException, NotExpertModeException, NotEnoughCoinsException, CharacterCardAlreadyActivatedException, IncorrectOperationException
      checks if the arguments of the operation are valid, if so the game activates the jester card effect
      Specified by:
      executeOperation in class Operation
      Throws:
      PlayerNotInListException - thrown if the player that executed the operation is not in the player list of the room
      NotExpertModeException - thrown if the player tries to play a character card but the game is not in expert mode
      NotEnoughCoinsException - thrown if the player doesn't have enough coins to play the selected character card
      CharacterCardAlreadyActivatedException - thrown if a player tries to activate a character card that has already been played in the current turn
      IncorrectOperationException - thrown if a player tries to do an operation that should not be done in the current phase or the player gives an invalid input

    • searchStudentsOnCard

      private void searchStudentsOnCard() throws IncorrectOperationException
      Checks if on Jester card the students are enough
      Throws:
      IncorrectOperationException - thrown if there aren't enough students on the jester card

    • searchStudentsInEntrance

      private void searchStudentsInEntrance() throws IncorrectOperationException
      check if the students in the entrance are enough
      Throws:
      IncorrectOperationException - thrown if there aren't enough students in the entrance
